task_data.title: GOVERNANCE UPGRADE - Phase 6: Governance Metrics & Continuous Improvement. Build governance KPI framework with 20+ metrics, real-time metrics collection system, executive governance dashboard, continuous improvement process with ML-driven insights. Implement MetricsCollector class, governance health score calculation, trend analysis and forecasting, actionable recommendations engine. Success criteria: Track 20+ governance KPIs, real-time metric updates <100ms, 95%+ dashboard uptime, automated improvement recommendations with 80%+ accuracy.
